Note: {Zt} ∼ WN(0,σZ2 ) denotes white noise.
## 1. You are given the following ARMA(p,q) model: Xt = 25 Xt−1 − 2Xt−2 + 21 Xt−3 + Zt − 12 Zt−1. Which of the following statements is false?
A. The model is non-stationary.
B. The model is ARMA(3,1).
C. The model is invertible.
D. The model can be restated as ARMA(2,0). E. None of the above.
